actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the study of certain lands in Louisiana to determine their suitability for designation as wilderness.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to review the suitability of designating specified lands in Kisatchie National Forest, Louisiana, as wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the study of certain lands in Louisiana to determine their suitability for designation as wilderness.
